pillars.name: The Settlement
pillars.description: People have appropriate access to common services and infrastructure.

pillars.name: The Living Conditions
pillars.description: People can live properly and with dignity in their dwelling.

themes.name: Presence of Hazards
themes.description: Households live in safe settlements in terms of location.

themes.name: Physical safety
themes.description: Households live in adequate dwellings in terms of physical protection from the weather, structural integrity and location.

themes.name: Overcrowding and privacy
themes.description: Dwellings provide sufficient space and privacy to the inhabitants of the shelter.

themes.name: Habitability and health
themes.description: Dwellings provide protection against the weather to achieve thermal comfort, sufficient ventilation and protection against vectors.

themes.name: Security of tenure
themes.description: Households perceive their tenure as secure and do not fear losing their home or land in the near future.

themes.name: Accessibility
themes.description: Dwellings accommodate for persons with disabilities, allowing access and movement in the home.

themes.name: Thermal comfort (clothing)
themes.description: People have sufficient and appropriate quality clothing.

themes.name: Energy
themes.description: People have access to sufficient, safe and affordable energy supply.

themes.name: Cooking items
themes.description: People have sufficient and appropriate items to prepare and eat food.

themes.name: Sleeping
themes.description: People have sufficient and appropriate quality items for safe, healthy and private sleeping.

themes.name: Cleanliness (Hygiene)
themes.description: People have sufficient and appropriate items to maintain the shelter clean and store waste.

themes.name: Access to services and resources
themes.description: People have access to basic services in their settlements.
